thread.title: There Are So Many Other Creatures in These Kong: Skull Island TV Spots
thread.title_full: There Are So Many Other Creatures in These Kong: Skull Island TV Spots

author: Germain Lussier
title: There Are So Many Other Creatures in These Kong: Skull Island TV Spots

organizations.name: skull island tv spots several tv

text:
Several TV spots for Kong: Skull Island just came online and the main takeaway is: Kong is not alone on that island. Advertisement 
Sure, there are human characters played by the likes of Tom Hiddleston, Brie Larson, John Goodman, John C. Reilly, Samuel L. Jackson, and others, but it’s the spiders, dinosaurs, and other creepy crawly things we’re interested in. And there appear to be a lot of them. 
Check out these new Kong TV spots from Toho, Collider, Tom Hiddleston, and Samuel L. Jackson: 
I just can’t get over the visuals in the movie. It looks so lush that you kind of just want to roll around in it and fall asleep. The greens and oranges just look so warm, and instantly show you that this is a film set in the Seventies. Not to mention, those creatures all fighting Kong look pretty great too. Advertisement
